name: 吳浴沂
objective:
1. 內燃機介紹、引擎型式及運轉特性
2. 引擎循環、熱化學與燃料
3. 進氣與燃料供應系統
4. 燃燒室內氣流運動
5. 燃燒
6. 排氣流動、廢氣排放與空氣污染
7. 引擎熱傳、摩擦與潤滑
8. 引擎實驗
schedule:
週次	講授內容概要
1	Introduction
2	Introduction, Operating Characteristics
3	Operating Characteristics
4	Engine Cycles
5	Engine Cycles, Thermochemistry and Fuel
6	Thermochemistry and Fuel
7	Air Induction
8	Fuel Induction
9	期中考
10	Fluid Motion
11	Combustion
12	Combustion
13	Emissions and Air Pollution
14	Emissions and Air Pollution
15	Heat Transfer in Engines
16	Friction and Lubrication
17	Engine Experiment
18	期末考
materials:
Engineering Fundamental of the Internal Combustin Engines, 2nd Edition
By: Willard W. Pulkrabek
